動物用藥品名稱: 輝瑞豬大腸桿菌類毒素不活化菌苗
業者名稱: 臺灣碩騰股份有限公司
地址: 601 WEST CORNHUSKER, HIGHWAY, LINCOLN NEBRASKA, 68521 U.S.A.
效能(適應症): 預防初生仔豬大腸桿菌症。
成分: 本疫苗是由E.COLI K99, K88, 987P, F41等大腸桿菌株經不活化製成。每劑量含有Ercherichia coli (strain 1471)≧1.36 Relative Potency	  Ercherichia coli (strain 1413)≧1.44 Relative Potency	  Ercherichia coli (strain pPS002)≧1.41 Relative Potency	  Ercherichia coli (strain NL-1001)≧1.62 Relative Potency	  Ercherichia coli (strain NL-1005)≧1.48 Relative Potency
